codes.0: Properties WITHOUT windstorm protective device credit OR Does Not Apply
codes.1: Properties WITH properly installed and maintained windstorm protective devices (ML-415) and mobile home meets wind load provisions set forth in the ANSI/ASCE 7-88
codes.2: Properties WITH properly installed and maintained windstorm protective devices (ML-415) and mobile home DOES NOT meet wind load provisions set forth in the ANSI/ASCE 7-88

codes.0: Properties WITHOUT windstorm protective device credit OR Does Not Apply
codes.1: Properties WITH windstorm protective device credit for having installed protective devices on all openings: AAIS ML-415 Endorsement or equivalent / ISO HO 04 21 Endorsement or equivalent

codes.0: Policies NOT written on a consent-to-rate basis OR Does Not Apply
codes.1: Policies written on a consent-to-rate basis

codes.0: Properties WITHOUT manufacturing standard credit OR Does Not Apply

codes.1: Properties with away from premises theft exclusion: AAIS ML-185 Endorsement or equivalent / ISO HO 23 95 Endorsement or equivalent
codes.2: Properties with away from premises theft limitation: AAIS ML-186 Endorsement or equivalent

codes.1: California Homeowners policy with wrap-around endorsement

codes.0: Policies without Hurricane Exclusion Endorsement OR Does Not Apply
codes.1: Policies with Hurricane Exclusion Endorsement (ISO HO 05 18 or equivalent) and WITHOUT the Hurricane Coverage Endorsement (ISO HO 05 19 or equivalent)
codes.2: Policies with Hurricane Exclusion Endorsement (ISO HO 05 18 or equivalent) and WITH the Hurricane Coverage Endorsement (ISO HO 05 19 or equivalent)

codes.0: Lead poisoning liability coverage not excluded OR Does Not Apply
codes.1: Liability coverage excludes lead poisoning liability (ISO HO 24 51 or equivalent) - limited coverage for lead liability DOES NOT apply
codes.2: Liability coverage excludes lead poisoning liability (ISO HO 24 51 or equivalent) - limited coverage for lead liability DOES apply (ISO HO 24 52 or equivalent)

codes.1: New York Homeowners policy with wrap-around endorsement
